relation: They have activities all the time. They have bonfires, concerts, laser tag, and etc... There is always something to do during the week.
Some of the food is great. The Red Hawk Dinner has great food and is always open.
A lot of the people that dorm go home during the weekends. The new dorms are very nice and comfortable. They always keep them looking clean and new.
Montclair focuses a lot on writing. They want their students to excel in writing. The writing classes that are mandatory can be challenging.
Do not be scared to ask for help. Everyone at Montclair State is always willing to help.
The diversity in Montclair is very high. It has a beautiful campus and you feel safe walking at night. Everyone is extremely helpful and friendly.
pageTitle: Montclair State University (MSU) Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {572263=© 2015, Cappex.com, LLC, 515083=There are numerous student body groups like student government and ethnic/religious groups. Club Sports is also an expanding entity. I am the Vice President and a co-founder of men's club lacrosse at MSU. Spring of 2014 will be our first season. There are contact sports like hockey and wrestling, and ladies, there's a club ice hockey team for you as well as of this year. There is also basketball, volleyball, swimming, soccer -men's team also just recently established. So there are plenty of groups to join and there is still the opportunity for you to be a founder of club sport or some sort of student association., 82342=We have our very own Guy Fieri restaurant on campus that just opened in the fall of 2012, Guy himself even came to sign autographs!, 59851=The brand new Machuga Heights and Dinallo Heights were completed in September of 2011, and they are as beautiful as a 5 star hotel!, 48683=A beautiful dining facility was built and opened it doors in the fall of 2011. The food is supplied by Sudexo and is very appetizing. There are several sections of the dining facility, providing a variety of choices, even for vegetarians and students with other special eating needs., 448=Montclair State is an artsy school, a school that is well known for its arts. Montclair State's arts programs like music, acting, dance, musical theater, and painting are well known across the nation. Also, Montclair State has a well known teaching program, and has the nation's only doctorate program in pedagogy. Montclair State was originally founded in 1908 as a school to train, educate, and produce qualified teachers., 152545=although montclair state university is largely a commuter school, they are moving greatly towards providing as much housing as possible. msu is the only university in new jersey to have a 2000 approximate dorm building called the heights.}

textAfterTable: Benjamin 06/01/2010 Reviewer is A current student here. 16 out of 16 people found this review useful. 2 of 136 Categories Comments Great for these types of students MSU is great for all kinds of students campus community is very diverse fun and beautiful. Many activities to do. I'll recommend this school to anyone who wants to have a future!!! Tips for prospective students Well you would have probably heard a lot of things about Montclair( many terrible things) but I want to tell you otherwise MSU is one of the greatest public schools in the state and country at large. It is very affordable, environment is very conducive, students are active friendly and intelligent, staff are resourceful and helpful even though there maybe some exceptions, food is OK, plenty activities to do a lot of clubs and organizations, financial aid and scholarships are available, on campus jobs are available and they even bend it around your schedule, there is also a train station on campus that takes you to NY. People MSU is really a great school I believe you should come and see for yourself. Just
